Package edu.rit.g2.parser

package edu.rit.g2.parser
Provides schema parsing logic and related components.

This package defines how schema files (JSON, XML, etc.) are converted into SchemaModel instances.

Includes:

  • SchemaParser – top-level parser interface
  • JsonSchemaParser
  • XmlSchemaParser
  • DbmsType – supported SQL dialects
  • SchemaParsingException – parsing error type

Parsers are instantiated using ParserFactory.

Since:
1.0
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    edu.rit.g2
    Root package for the Schema2Script application.
  • Class
    Description
    DbmsType
    Represents the supported Database Management System (DBMS) types that the Schema2Script application can work with.
    JsonSchemaParser
    Parses schema definitions written in JSON format and converts them into a SchemaModel.
    SchemaParser
    Defines the contract for schema parsers capable of reading external schema files and converting them into a SchemaModel.
    SchemaParsingException
    Exception thrown when a schema file cannot be parsed correctly.
    XmlSchemaParser
    Parses XML-based schema definition files and converts them into a SchemaModel.
